TopicTitle: Horizon III : Ion Interplanetary Ship with 2 Drop Pods (Info in the post)

Articles.Content:
> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/VC0bw)

("DP" is with docked Drops Pods)

Weight: 73 ton / 82 ton DP 

Delta-V: 15503 / 13482 DP 

Parts: 467 / 529 DP 

TWR: 0.11 / 0.09 DP

Delta-V of Drop Pod: 3200m/s
I like the Idea of using Drop Pods. I think i will copy the Idea with Drop Pods for my Interplanetary Colonies ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
That's some beautiful shots you have there.
